text: Kodi inu simuona mmene Mulungu amayendetsera mitambo? Ndipo amaisonkhanitsira ndi kuiika m’gulu limodzi ndipo inu mumaona mvula ili kuchokera mu mitamboyo. Kuchokera ku mapiri a kumwamba, Iye amatumiza mphepo kuti ipeze kumupeza wina aliyense amene wamufuna ndi kusiya aliyense amene wamufuna. Chilangali cha mphenzi zake chimakhala pang’ono kuti chilande maso a anthu
